playGame() - Method in class uiClasses.CmdLineUi
While the game has not been finished, playGame calls methods to print the actions available to the player, take input from the player and handles that input to perform actions.
playGame() - Method in interface uiClasses.GameUi
Allows the user to pick which of the main actions of the game to perform, and calls methods/classes required to perform them.
playGame() - Method in class uiClasses.gui.Gui
Creates the coreOptionsScreen from which the player can select which action they would like to do.
possibleRoutes(Island) - Method in class coreClasses.Island
Searches through the current island's routes to find those that go to the island the player wishes to travel to.
